body.name: Eddie Bauer Kids' Winter Jacket - Heavyweight Quilted Down Jacket - Insulated Hooded Outerwear Coat for Boys (XS-XL)
features: Fabric type Shell: 100% Recycled Polyester; Faux Fur: 100% Polyester; Sleeve Lining: 100% Polyester; Filling: 70% Down, 30% Feathers

OFFICIALLY LICENSED EDDIE BAUER: Heavyweight Quilted Down Jacket for Boys and Girls; Eddie Bauer combines its adventure-driven innovation with even more sustainability and inclusivity, using materials and methods that minimize impact, and building an outdoor culture open to everyone

650 FILL POWER DOWN: Responsible Down Standard Certified; Wherever you go, you can count on this kids' winter jacket for fashion and warmth; Perfect for school, hanging with friends, or spending time with family; Our puffer winter jacket for girls and boys combines modern fashion with outstanding functionality and convenience

FUNCTIONAL JACKET: Deep hip pockets cover chilly hands and keep valuables safe; With this fashionable down jacket, your child will enjoy warm insulation against the elements; Wide hood and large collar guarantee extra warmth and grant an additional level of protection against unfavorable weather conditions

DURABLE FABRIC: We fashioned this puffer jacket for boys and girls from wind and water resistant fabric that will ensure your child stays comfortable when the rain or snow comes down; Perfect for winter sports and casual wear, this extra warm and comfy winter coat comes in a variety of fashionable colors to match your child's unique style

COMFORT FIT: Comfortable and extra warm insulated jacket for boys and girls comes in a variety of sizes to ensure a perfect fit; With several classic color options to choose from, this hooded winter jacket is a perfect gift idea for sons, daughters, brothers, sisters, nephews, nieces, grandsons, granddaughters, cousins, and friends
body.description: Eddie Bauer Kids' Winter Jacket - Heavyweight Quilted Down Jacket - Insulated Hooded Outerwear Coat for Boys/Girls is a great choice for every fashionable kid when the temperature drops. Let your daughter or son stay comfortable on chilly days with a heavyweight, extra warm, and stylish winter jacket, designed with fashion and comfort in mind. Featuring deep hip pockets to protect their hands from the cold and extra warm fabric for maximum comfort, this stylish outerwear is perfect for school, going to the mall, or having fun on the slope. GREAT INSULATION: Your little girl or boy will stay on top of winter weather with the premium down insulation while the comfy hood and large collar will make their life so much easier during the unpredictable fall and winter seasons. SOFT AND COMFY: Go from chilly to comfy in seconds. This winter jacket helps little girls and boys adapt perfectly to the weather outside and keeps them warm and stylish every day. DURABLE: Whether your child is hanging out on a cold day or having fun in the snow with family and friends, you won't have to worry about ripping and fading. The durable fabric will last through all their outdoor adventures and winter activities. WINTER COAT: Our water and wind-resistant winter coat for girls and boys delivers proper protection against the elements while the high-quality materials guarantee maximum warmth and comfort throughout the day. EASY TO CLEAN: Simply machine wash and tumble dry; Please Reference the Variations for All Available Sizes & Colors! Eddie Bauer Offers Premium Clothing at Affordable Prices because we value every customer that visits our listings! Stop by Our Storefront to See the Rest of Our Great Deals; we're confident you're going to find items that anyone who needs a gift will absolutely love and adore

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great winter jacket that actually fits like it should
reviews.reviewText: As expected and as advertised!What we bought : Eddie Bauer Classic Down Heavyweight Jacket and we love it !Pluses : Great appearance, fun colors, warm but not a heavy weight and perfect fit. We got a size bigger for the age but check the measurements for your child (I have a taller kid and we wear a sweater under) Love the bright blue color, so I can actually spot my kid in a sea of grey jackets . No restrictions on movement, not a bulky fit , and the length is just right . The sleeves are perfect and have elastic cuffs. The jacket covers the lower back well but not too long so kids can be as active as they can. Sherpa lining is soft and cozy . Great call on the hood lining - it keeps kids warm when they lose the hat in school ( I’m guessing we are not the only ones) We paired it with the same blue color snow pants from artix that comes w bib for those snowy winter days.We like that’s this jacket versatile to be able to ski and tubing or just to walk to school ( gasp . Yes we walk a lot in Chicago winter no matter what weather and we strongly recommend it , yay for exercise, fresh air and oxygen for the brain) overall it’s a cool, warm, affordable and washable jacket. (Machine wash ) good style that doesn’t look like it’s from the last century . We recommend it and Can’t wait to wear it . Will update after this winter if lasted or if my kid killed it ... Huge plus of you buy it on sale as kids grow fast (always watch for Amazon deals) Hope this helps !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Son Loves this!
reviews.reviewText: My son loves this Jacket. As soon as he put it on he said: "It is so soft". He also thought it was super cool that the pockets zippered closed. He is 5 and he got an XS and it fits him pretty well with a bit of room to grow into. It also looks thick and warm but it's very lightweight as well. Overall great jacket!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Got this for my son for a three day18 mile hike in temps down to 6. Jacket fit great and kept him warm day and night.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My 13 year old son finally has a coat that he likes to wear. The fit is perfect for him (size L) ; he’s a small 12 year old, not yet 5’ and appx. 70lbs. It keeps him warm in 25 degree Midwest winter morning up at the bus stop, and it looks cool! The quality is great- it’s Eddie Bauer, so I expected that. Very happy with this coat!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and warm
reviews.reviewText: Excellent quality, vivid colors, warm and SO CUTE!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am always leery of products advertised, but this jacket was true to its word. Wonderful jacket and it looks awesome!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great value, very soft, true to size

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid coat for my kid
reviews.reviewText: I got a size bigger than he normally wears and it is big on him but not *that* big- so I’m not sure if we will get to next winter, but as he’s in the middle of a growth spurt, I’m at least confident we’ll get through this winter with it. This is a very warm coat with a hood that stays up! Not too heavy, but not so thin that I would worry about midwest winters. I’m happy with the purchase!
